name: GunsAndGoos
description:
There are four levels!

Instructions:

Your mission is to eliminate the enemy slimes before they overwhelm you.

To do this, place towers or walls by selecting them from the lower left.
Be careful as you’ll need to manage your juice properly. Defeat slimes to
obtain juice and spend that juice on defenses.

If the slimes rage or if the central structure loses seven hearts, it’s Game Over.

Tip: You can use 1, 2, or 3, on the keyboard to select the towers or walls.

Good Luck!

Original Music

Art -

https://gamesupply.itch.io/heart-package

https://www.kenney.nl/assets/tower-defense-top-down
